document_data.name: Mosque of Hakiyah the Honest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mosque of Hakiyah the Honest''' was located in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Location: This temple could be found in the [[Pilgrims' District]] of the City of Delights.
document_data.Defenses: The entire structure of the mosque was enchanted so that one could not enter under false pretenses, including invisibility or wearing illusions.
document_data.Inhabitants: High Priest Imam [[Kerim]] was the head of the mosque. He supervised over 200 lesser ranking priests of [[Hakiyah]] and other laymen.
document_data.Activities:
Much of the worship and meditation that occurred in this mosque took place in smaller chambers as opposed to a large central worship area.

The [[Soft Whisper]] used the basement of the mosque to plan their actions to protect the life of the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]].
